name: Venus Body | Concept
description:
A lora based on the female body type venus body

Its a body type that has thick thighs,wide hips,(and usual giant breasts). combined with having a somewhat slim waist. Without the girl being fat and having a massive stomach.

I found out that it was quite hard to get this bodytype in most models especially realistic so I made a lora for it

Trained with 301 images

tested on 10 models

Image info

  • Model used kotomix

  • Model used abyssorange2hard

  • bad hands embedding

  • bad artist embedding

  • bad prompt embedding

  • deep negative embedding

Notes

  • I didn't prune any tags so you have to specify what you want ig(gigantic breasts,thick thighs,gigantic ass) etc

  • You can get pretty extreme proportions if you widen the resolution (640x640)

Known Issues

  • using this lora on realistic models has a higher chance for a double belly buttonbelly abnormalties at higher weights

Training settings?

The most important part of training is getting a good dataset!

Training settings can be found by installing the additional networks extension in auto1111

Extensions -> available -> load from -> additional networks

Restart webui

place lora into stable-diffusion-webui\extensions\sd-webui-additional-networks\models\lora

To view the training settings

Go to additional network tab -> choose model -> training paramters
